title.narrative: PRO-Swazi: Promotion of rural opportunities in Swaziland

description.narrative: 1. Income generating and agro-business micro-projects for vulnerable farmers created in 10 communities. 2. Business Management, Marketing, and production capacities improved for 240 youths. 3. Coordination and services of local NSA/LA and farmers associations networks reinforced to guarantee support to the production and easier access to market

title.narrative: Non-State Actors and Local Authorities in Development – Actions in Swaziland 2011
Number of income generating and agro-business (IGA) micro projects reporting an increase in production in the 10 target communities of the Lubombo Region

title.narrative: Number of income generating and agro-business (IGA) micro projects reporting an increase in production in the 10 target communities of the Lubombo Region

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
